alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:51PM EST until December 20 at 8:12PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Fort Edward. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Water reaches Route 9N in Corinth, floods cellars in Corinth and reaches first floors along Old Bend Road in Moreau. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:31 PM EST Monday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Fort Edward Flood Stage: 26.0 Observed Stage at Mon 10 pm: 26.5 Forecast: Tue 1 am 27.6 Tue 7 am 28.2 Tue 1 pm 28.2 Tue 7 pm 27.8 Wed 1 am 27.2 Wed 7 am 26.6 Wed 1 pm 26.1 Wed 7 pm 25.6 Thu 1 am 25.2 Thu 7 am 24.8 Thu 1 pm 24.5 Thu 7 pm 24.2 &&
